trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A KeyPressEventArgs specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: Um KeyPressEventArgs Especifica o caráter que é composto quando o utilizador prime uma chave.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property returns an uppercase K. A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event occurs when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando o utilizador prime SHIFT + K, a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>devolve um k maiúsculas A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento ocorre quando o utilizador prime uma chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two events that are closely related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: Dois eventos que estão estreitamente relacionadas com os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>eventos são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event precedes each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event when the user presses a key, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event occurs when the user releases a key.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>eventos precede cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>eventos quando o utilizador prime uma chave e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>evento ocorre quando o utilizador liberta uma tecla.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: When the user holds down a key, duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> events occur each time the character repeats.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador retém para baixo de uma chave, duplicar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>eventos ocorrem sempre que o caráter repete.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event is generated upon release.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>evento é gerado após a versão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: With each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, a KeyPressEventArgs is passed.
trans-unit.target: Com cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento, um KeyPressEventArgs é transmitida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>seja passado com cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>Especifica se a quaisquer chaves modificador (CTRL, SHIFT ou ALT) foram premidos juntamente com outra chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (This modifier information can also be obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.) Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: (Esta informação modificador também pode ser obtida através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe.)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> Definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true` para cancelar o `KeyPress` eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This keeps the control from processing the key press.
trans-unit.target: Isto mantém o controlo de processar prima chave.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some controls will process certain key strokes on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alguns controlos processará determinados traços chaves no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> processes the Enter key before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> is called.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>processa a tecla Enter antes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: In such cases, you cannot cancel the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, and must cancel the key stroke from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: Nestes casos, não é possível cancelar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento e têm de cancelar o traço chave do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o modelo de evento, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the current state of the modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter o estado atual das chaves modificador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character corresponding to the key the user pressed.
trans-unit.target: O correspondente à chave de carateres ASCII em que o utilizador premido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> evento foi processado.

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing.
trans-unit.target: Se o evento não é processado, serão enviada para o sistema operativo para o processamento de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Set Handled to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: Definir Handled `true` para cancelar o `KeyPress` eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento é processado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caráter correspondente à chave premido.

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyChar property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade KeyChar batimentos de tecla de exemplo no tempo de execução e modificar batimentos de tecla circunstâncias especiais do tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use KeyChar to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar KeyChar para desativar keypresses não numéricos quando o utilizador introduz um código postal, alterar keypresses alfabética com todos os em maiúsculas num campo de entrada de dados, ou monitorizar o teclado ou outro dispositivo de entrada chave para combinações de teclas específicos.

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the following keys: - a-z, A-Z.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter ou definir as seguintes chaves: - a-z, A-Z.

trans-unit.source: - CTRL.
trans-unit.target: -CTRL.

trans-unit.source: - Punctuation marks.
trans-unit.target: -Sinais de pontuação.

trans-unit.source: - Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad.
trans-unit.target: -Número de chaves, tanto na parte superior do teclado e no teclado numérico.

trans-unit.source: - ENTER.
trans-unit.target: -INTRODUZA.

trans-unit.source: You cannot get or set the following keys: - The TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível obter ou definir as seguintes chaves:-tecla de tabulação o.

trans-unit.source: - INSERT and DELETE.
trans-unit.target: -INSERT e eliminar.

trans-unit.source: - HOME.
trans-unit.target: -INICIAL.

trans-unit.source: - END.
trans-unit.target: -END.

trans-unit.source: - PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN.
trans-unit.target: -PAGE UP e PAGE DOWN.
F1 F2.

trans-unit.source: - ALT.
trans-unit.target: -ALT.

trans-unit.source: - Arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: -Teclas de seta.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter informações sobre como detetar qualquer uma das chaves de caráter não mencionadas acima, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character that is composed.
trans-unit.target: O caráter de ASCII que é composto.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o utilizador prime SHIFT + K, esta propriedade devolve um k maiúsculas
